item.title: Raichur PDO Placed Under Suspension for RSS Parade Participation
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: The Karnataka Panchayat Raj Department has placed under suspension Praveen Kumar KP, Panchayat Development Officer of Sirwar taluk, following reports that he participated in an RSS parade during the RAS centenary celebrations in Lingasugur on October 12, 2025, while wearing the organizationâ€™s uniform and carrying the stick.
Praveen Kumar is presently posted as the Personal Secretary of MLA Manappa D. Vajjal.
The action comes after multiple official communications as well as media repo...]]>
item.author: Gururaj A Paniyadi, About The Author, Principal Correspondent With Deccan Chronicle, Specializes In Covering Coastal, North Karnataka Districts. His Expertise Lies In Political Analysis, He Holds A Profound Interest In Human Interest Stories, History, Culture. Offering Extensive Coverage, Gururaj Explores Various Facets, Including Politics
